summary: Day 3  of the @bnha-nextgen-week     Accidents | Bedtime stories | Mother/Father’s Day- (to the mod, please tell me if the...
caption:
Day 3  of the @bnha-nextgen-week     Accidents | Bedtime stories | Mother/Father’s Day- (to the mod, please tell me if the picture is not ok, I can censor the small pictures or cut them out ;))

When Tenya got a call from the hospital that his son got injured in a car accident all the old memories, he had came, back like a nightmare…

But youg Usamaru had luck, he explained that he tried one of his supporting items he build to jump from wall to wall, when he tried, it broke under the heat of his engines, the flight path changed and catapults him to the street, infront of a truck and back to the backstreet. Surprisingly someone, he talked before appeared telling him about his father but he is already half fainted. He tell him to keep calm that he can repair his engins who stand in all directions., After this he woke up in the hospital. 

Luck for him that his engines are just a little bettered and he still can use them.
btw he has both quirks of his parents but all of them are weaker than theirs.

Autor note: I took a lot of intensions in IIda’s face, wanted him to have the feelings like in the past when his brother got injured. I lust the references from the manga itself, and now that I see the finished and colored picture it feels like I had my goal but also I feel totaly sad for Iida.

blog.name: bnhasource
blog.title: BNHA SOURCE
blog.description: ☆ Welcome to BNHA Source!  We are a fansite dedicated to the animanga Boku No Hero Academia created by Kōhei Horikoshi. Here you will find artworks and edits of the anime and manga, along with news updates. We track the tag #bnhasource and #bnhaedit. ♥

blog.name: sheepgirly

blog.description: Alex | she/they | 19 | Personal | Art Tag: myart

summary: look im just gonna say this right now - everyone in bnha who continuously puts down the students for doing the right thing is...
body:
look im just gonna say this right now - everyone in bnha who continuously puts down the students for doing the right thing is getting on my nerves :/ i rb a post talking a lot more in detail of why midoriya doesn’t really ask for help and it’s so apparent why !!

im gonna just talk a little about what made so upset right now, though - when aizawa claimed he would’ve expelled all of the students if it wasnt for all might retiring - i love aizawa but saying he was gonna expel every student in 1-A except like 3 kids because midoriya and crew saved bakugou is fucking ridiculous. i know they want to follow the rules or whatever but its SUPER annoying when the kids do the right thing and get reprimanded for doing it (and many times if they didnt do it the situation would’ve turned out awful).

summary: Heeey~ Can I request hc on dating Tokoyami please? I love your writing btw ^w^
question: Heeey~ Can I request hc on dating Tokoyami please? I love your writing btw ^w^
answer:
Heeello~ Of course you can, Anon! And thank you for your compliment! It means a lot to me ^~^ Hope you like what I wrote!💕

  • Dating the Chicken of Darkness (is it okay if I call him that?) was like dating the definition of mysterious and a mess when it comes to showing some kind of affection.
  • Sure, it may not be all the time, like, he’s fine with hand holding and giving you short smiles. But kissing and stuff is a whole other thing.
  • He’s never really thought about being in a relationship with anyone, since he hasn’t found the right one. Well, that was until he met you.
  • The love in a romantic way, was a whole new feeling for Tokoyami, so it would be a bit stiff at first. The only thing you’d ever do in private is give short kisses.
  • But when you start to warm up to each other, or rather him warming up to you, he shows you the affection you need every single day.
  • He makes sure that you know that he loves you.
  • Dating Tokoyami would include going to the park for dates, going on an adventure, or trying something new.
  • He’s always willing to do anything you want to do, but as long as it isn’t too dark, otherwise Dark Shadow might go on a rampage.
  • Speaking of Dark Shadow, Tokoyami would always make sure that his Quirk never hurt you, if the lighting is too dark.
  • If that ever happened, Tokoyami would almost be too afraid to go out when it starts to get dark outside. Cause the fear of hurting you, is highest on his list of things he doesn’t want to happen.
  • But also, Dark Shadow can also be like a guard dog when you and Tokoyami are together. Dark Shadow would do all in its power to protect you.
  • On the outside, Tokoyami may look like the emo kid in class, but honestly, he’s just a soft boy once you get to deeply know him.

blog.name: savetheirhearts-midoriya
blog.title: Live Long Enough to Become the Hero
blog.description:
Dani!! — she/her —22—Shipper, writer, rocker, history major — formerly yesimafanboy— For All My Fandoms.

Ao3: DaniDeservedBetter

summary: what are your thoughts my theories
body:
what are your thoughts my theories

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/145069488107/all-for-one-is-midoriyas-father

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/146365064482/all-might-will-die-because-he-protected-endeavor/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/179390222842/bakugou-will-have-some-form-of-interaction-with/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/174955499552/on-references-to-greek-mythology-and-buddhism-in/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/179291393312/izuku-will-be-suspected-to-be-the-traitor/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/175864250382/endeavor-will-lose-his-quirk/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/179291742627/all-might-will-fail-to-save-shigaraki-but-endeavor/embed

——————————————

Thanks for sending in your theories, I’m always interested in predictions and stuff! Here are my thoughts:

1. Dad for One Theory. I just reblogged this one! There is a lot of evidence for it, a lot of good evidence, but like I said, I hope it’s not true. I just hope that Horikoshi is showing how similar the heroes and the villains really are in order to make the villains more sympathetic, maybe, or even Deku less sympathetic? I would applaud Hori much harder of this was the case. It just feels too predictable, too trite, and too much like other shounen. MHA is already so unique with the way it plays with tropes– I really hope that it subverts our expectations with this one, too.

2. All Might will Die Protecting Someone Else Despite Not Having One for All. Listen, I can get behind this one. I have a strong feeling All Might isn’t going to live to see the end of the series. Which… :( But it’s true! And I also could totally seeing it being Bakugo or Endeavor. I totally caught the similarities between Deku/Bakugo and All Might/Endeavor! And since Endeavor is becoming a bigger face in the series now, I could imagine that it would be him. And that is such a good point about the next generation needing to become better people than the last, something I hope to explore in my fics here soon. Personally, I’m not sure how I would want something like this to play out, there are strong arguments for either, but I really like this theory! “Endeavor is what Bakugo would’ve become if he’d stayed on the same path–” Absolutely.

3. Bakugo will have some interaction with Endeavor. This theory uses lots of info from the above one, all of which I totally agree with. I would love for Kacchan to have a moment of self reflection, thinking. “Oh, God. That could have been me.”

4. References to Greek and Buddhist legends. This is the kind of thing I love, love, love seeing in stories! Particularly, the parallels to how you explained Buddhism are strong. This is something I didn’t know about, so thank you for sharing this one with me! Shiozaki potentially being Christian is also a very strong one. This was very enlightening, thanks!

5. Deku will be suspected to be the traitor. Remember that text post about Izuku accidentally losing his Quirk books and the League finding them and everyone wondering why they suddenly know all their strategies? Lol. This one would be so angsty, good lord. Nedzu losing his position makes me think there will be an Umbridge type who replaces him, if that’s the direction Hori goes. (Which. Yikers.) I’m actually kind of surprised that no one is suspicious about Deku already, maybe not in a malicious way, but definitely in a “all this crap is happening and you’re still acting shady are you ok?” kind of way. The more evidence you went through, the worse it looks for him. This would be a very interesting subplot, maybe even with some of his friends doubting him? I think only his very close friends such as Tenya, Ochako, Kacchan, and Shoto would have 100% no reason to doubt him, since at least one of them was there during all the potential damning occasions. I like this one, I wouldn’t mind seeing it at all!

6. Endeavor will lose his Quirk. I’m kind of shaky on this one, since Hori has said he’s never head of Avatar and the parallels were unintentional lol. All Might already lost his, very publicly, so repeating such a thing will lose its impact, I think! Unless Endeavor isn’t the only one to lose his Quirk, and several other top heroes do as well. Then, it becomes terrifying.

7. All Might won’t save Shigaraki but Endeavor will save Dabi. This would be such a sweet thing to see. I agree with pretty much everything @hamliet said. All Might and Shigaraki was foreshadowed to be a very big deal in the coming arcs, especially with his connection to Nana. I would really like to see something happen between these two, and it seems like too big of a plot thread that Shigaraki left dangling– just like he left Stain’s arc unresolved, and I believe we’ll see him again. Will this play into my feelings that All Might won’t survive the series? Maybe. I have a hard time determining whether Hori will put All Might’s focus on one or both of them, or leave Izuku to it! I could see it happening, though. And I don’t think Endeavor will save Dabi, either. I think it’ll be Shoto. That would leave nice parallels between them and Izuku/Shigaraki, because I do think Deku will try to save him. I really don’t know if it’ll be permanently, though.

But oh my god guys. Nana’s alive inside of Deku. Does she know her grandson’s fate? What will happen when she finds out?

And what will happen to Deku because of it?

reblog.comment:
what are your thoughts my theories

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/145069488107/all-for-one-is-midoriyas-father

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/146365064482/all-might-will-die-because-he-protected-endeavor/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/179390222842/bakugou-will-have-some-form-of-interaction-with/embed

——————————————

Then, it becomes terrifying.

But oh my god guys. Nana’s alive inside of Deku. Does she know her grandson’s fate? What will happen when she finds out?

And what will happen to Deku because of it?

trail.content_raw:
what are your thoughts my theories

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/145069488107/all-for-one-is-midoriyas-father

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/146365064482/all-might-will-die-because-he-protected-endeavor/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/179390222842/bakugou-will-have-some-form-of-interaction-with/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/174955499552/on-references-to-greek-mythology-and-buddhism-in/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/179291393312/izuku-will-be-suspected-to-be-the-traitor/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/175864250382/endeavor-will-lose-his-quirk/embed

https://megashadowdragon.tumblr.com/post/179291742627/all-might-will-fail-to-save-shigaraki-but-endeavor/embed

——————————————

Thanks for sending in your theories, I’m always interested in predictions and stuff! Here are my thoughts:

1. Dad for One Theory. I just reblogged this one! There is a lot of evidence for it, a lot of good evidence, but like I said, I hope it’s not true. I just hope that Horikoshi is showing how similar the heroes and the villains really are in order to make the villains more sympathetic, maybe, or even Deku less sympathetic? I would applaud Hori much harder of this was the case. It just feels too predictable, too trite, and too much like other shounen. MHA is already so unique with the way it plays with tropes– I really hope that it subverts our expectations with this one, too.

2. All Might will Die Protecting Someone Else Despite Not Having One for All. Listen, I can get behind this one. I have a strong feeling All Might isn’t going to live to see the end of the series. Which… :( But it’s true! And I also could totally seeing it being Bakugo or Endeavor. I totally caught the similarities between Deku/Bakugo and All Might/Endeavor! And since Endeavor is becoming a bigger face in the series now, I could imagine that it would be him. And that is such a good point about the next generation needing to become better people than the last, something I hope to explore in my fics here soon. Personally, I’m not sure how I would want something like this to play out, there are strong arguments for either, but I really like this theory! “Endeavor is what Bakugo would’ve become if he’d stayed on the same path–” Absolutely.

3. Bakugo will have some interaction with Endeavor. This theory uses lots of info from the above one, all of which I totally agree with. I would love for Kacchan to have a moment of self reflection, thinking. “Oh, God. That could have been me.”

4. References to Greek and Buddhist legends. This is the kind of thing I love, love, love seeing in stories! Particularly, the parallels to how you explained Buddhism are strong. This is something I didn’t know about, so thank you for sharing this one with me! Shiozaki potentially being Christian is also a very strong one. This was very enlightening, thanks!

5. Deku will be suspected to be the traitor. Remember that text post about Izuku accidentally losing his Quirk books and the League finding them and everyone wondering why they suddenly know all their strategies? Lol. This one would be so angsty, good lord. Nedzu losing his position makes me think there will be an Umbridge type who replaces him, if that’s the direction Hori goes. (Which. Yikers.) I’m actually kind of surprised that no one is suspicious about Deku already, maybe not in a malicious way, but definitely in a “all this crap is happening and you’re still acting shady are you ok?” kind of way. The more evidence you went through, the worse it looks for him. This would be a very interesting subplot, maybe even with some of his friends doubting him? I think only his very close friends such as Tenya, Ochako, Kacchan, and Shoto would have 100% no reason to doubt him, since at least one of them was there during all the potential damning occasions. I like this one, I wouldn’t mind seeing it at all!

6. Endeavor will lose his Quirk. I’m kind of shaky on this one, since Hori has said he’s never head of Avatar and the parallels were unintentional lol. All Might already lost his, very publicly, so repeating such a thing will lose its impact, I think! Unless Endeavor isn’t the only one to lose his Quirk, and several other top heroes do as well. Then, it becomes terrifying.

7. All Might won’t save Shigaraki but Endeavor will save Dabi. This would be such a sweet thing to see. I agree with pretty much everything @hamliet said. All Might and Shigaraki was foreshadowed to be a very big deal in the coming arcs, especially with his connection to Nana. I would really like to see something happen between these two, and it seems like too big of a plot thread that Shigaraki left dangling– just like he left Stain’s arc unresolved, and I believe we’ll see him again. Will this play into my feelings that All Might won’t survive the series? Maybe. I have a hard time determining whether Hori will put All Might’s focus on one or both of them, or leave Izuku to it! I could see it happening, though. And I don’t think Endeavor will save Dabi, either. I think it’ll be Shoto. That would leave nice parallels between them and Izuku/Shigaraki, because I do think Deku will try to save him. I really don’t know if it’ll be permanently, though.

But oh my god guys. Nana’s alive inside of Deku. Does she know her grandson’s fate? What will happen when she finds out?

And what will happen to Deku because of it?

summary:
May I propose another AU of BNHA, where Tokoyami went to Izuku and Bakugou's middle school? And like,
Tokoyami was ostracized...
body:
May I propose another AU of BNHA, where Tokoyami went to Izuku and Bakugou’s middle school? And like,

  • Tokoyami was ostracized both for his appearance and his dangerous quirk.
  • Bakugou once tried to be his “friend” but he really only wanted to be associated with him because of Dark Shadow, which Bakugou deemed to be a strong quirk.
  • Tokoyami caught on to Bakugou’s motives easily and refused to talk to him
  • So Bakugou did as Bakugou does and basically locked him in a dark closet
  • Dark Shadow lashed out almost immediately, tearing the door down and setting on Bakugou and his lackies
  • From that point on Bakugou never goes near him
  • Enter Izuku Midoriya
  • Izuku knows loneliness when he sees it so he tries to make friends with Tokoyami
  • Tokoyami avoids him, thinking he’s just like Bakugou or the other students who are afraid of him
  • Izuku just,, reveals that he actually thinks that his quirk is cool,, and he’s not afraid.
  • They bros now
  • Tokoyami feels somewhat insecure about his appearance (bird head)
  • When Izuku finds out about that he shows up the next day with faux feathers weaved into his hair
  • It becomes habit to wear things like Tokoyami to make him feel more confident. Tokoyami though finds it silly but appreciates the effort so much and is very thankful
